text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to explain rules for professional guardian compensation (reimbursement of expenses, judicially fixed indemnity, paid from estate, etc.). Under section '3) Responsibilities and duties of the amministatore di sostegno', subsection 'G) Limits, compensation, and liability', the response states: 'Compensation: many family administrators do it without pay, but the judge can allow reimbursement of expenses and sometimes a fee depending on circumstances.' This directly addresses the required elements of compensation rules, including expense reimbursement and potential fees/indemnity fixed by the judge.", "criterion_id": "a7bd8154-0ac2-45ce-b540-bb8bdad7fc89"}
